title: Mishneh LaMelech on Mishneh Torah, Sacrifices Rendered Unfit

titles.text: משנה למלך על משנה תורה, הלכות פסולי המוקדשין
Mishneh LaMelech on Mishneh Torah, Sacrifices Rendered Unfit

schema.key: Mishneh LaMelech on Mishneh Torah, Sacrifices Rendered Unfit

enDesc: Originally written as a book of Talmudic novellae (chiddushim), it was redacted into a commentary on Rambam's Mishneh Torah by the author's devoted student, Rabbi Ya'akov Kuli, author of Me'am Loez.
